name: FINDING_NON_KIDNEY
description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form field Pathologic Findings in Nonneoplastic Kidney.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Pathologic Findings in Nonneoplastic Kidney.
entries: Insufficient tissue (part. nephrectomy specimen w/ <5 mm of adj. non-neoplastic kidn)
